Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 isravel Puththirar Enakkuk Kaanikkaiyaik Konduvarumbadi Avargalukkuch Sollu; Manappoorvamaai Urchaagaththudan Koduppavan Evano Avanidaththil Enakkuk Kaanikkaiyai Vaanguveergalaaga.
3 neengal Avargalidaththil Vaangavendiya Kaanikkaiyaavana, Ponnum, Velliyum, Vengalamum,
4 ilaneelanoolum, Raththaamparanoolum, Sivappunoolum, Melliya Panjunoolum, Vellaattumayirum,
5 sivappuththeerndha Aattukkadaaththolum, Thagasuththolum, Seeththim Maramum,
6 vilakkenneyum, Abishegathailaththukkup Parimalavarkkangalum, Dhoobaththukkuch Sugandhavarkkangalum,
7 epoththilum Maarppadhakkaththilum Padhikkum Komedhakak Karkalum Raththinangalume.
8 avargal Naduvile Naan Vaasam Panna, Enakku Oru Parisuththa Sthalaththai Undaakkuvaargalaaga.
9 naan Unakkuk Kaanbikkum Vaasasthalaththin Maadhiriyinbadiyum, Adhinudaiya Ellaath Thattumuttugalin Maadhiriyinbadiyum Adhaich Seyveergalaaga.
10 seeththim Maraththinaal Oru Pettiyaip Pannakkadavargal; Adhin Neelam Irantarai Muzhamum, Adhin Agalam Ondrarai Muzhamum, Adhan Uyaram Ondrarai Muzhamumaayiruppadhaaga.
11 adhai Engum Pasumpondhakattaal Mooduvaayaaga; Nee Adhin Utpuraththaiyum Velippuraththaiyum Adhinaal Moodi, Adhinmel Sutrilum Ponninaal Thiranaiyai Undaakki,
12 adharku Naalu Pon Valaiyangalai Vaarppiththu, Avaigalai Adhin Naalu Moolaigalilum Pottu, Oru Pakkaththil Irandu Valaiyangalum, Marupakkaththil Irandu Valaiyangalum Irukkumbadi Thaiththu,
13 seeththim Maraththaal Thandugalaich Seydhu, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodi,
14 andhath Thandugalaal Pettiyaich Sumakkumbadi, Avaigalaip Pettiyin Pakkangalilirukkum Valaiyangalile Paaichchakkadavaai.
15 andhath Thandugal Pettiyilirundhu Kazhatrappadaamal, Adhin Valaiyangalile Irukkavendum.
16 naan Unakkuk Kodukkum Saatchip Piramaanaththai Andhap Pettiyile Vaippaayaaga.
17 pasumponninaale Kirubaasanaththaip Pannuvaayaaga; Adhu Irandarai Muzha Neelamum Ondrarai Muzha Agalamumaai Irukkakkadavadhu.
18 ponninaal Irandu Kerubeengalaich Seyvaayaaga; Ponnaith Thagadaai Adiththu, Avaigalaich Seydhu, Kirubaasanaththin Irandu Orangalilum Vaippaayaaga.

19 oru Puraththu Oraththil Oru Kerubeenaiyum Marupuraththu Oraththil Matrak Kerubeenaiyum Pannivai; Andhak Kerubeengal Kirubaasanaththin Irandu Orangalilum Adhanode Egavelaiyaayirukkumbadi, Avaigalaip Pannakkadavaai.

20 andhak Kerubeengal Thangal Settaigalai Uyara Viriththu, Thangal Settaigalaal Kirubaasanaththai Moodugiravaigalum Ondrukkondru Edhirmugamullavaigalumaai Irukkakkadavadhu; Kerubeengalin Mugangal Kirubaasanaththai Nokkukiravaigalaayiruppadhaaga.
21 kirubaasanaththaip Pettiyinmeedhil Vaiththu, Pettikkulle Naan Unakkuk Kodukkum Saatchippiramaanaththai Vaippaayaaga.

22 ange Naan Unnaich Sandhippen; Kirubaasanaththinmeedhilum Saatchippettiyinmel Nirkum Irandu Kerubeengalin Naduvilum Irundhu Naan Isravel Puththirarukkaaga Unakkuk Karpikkap Pogiravaigalaiyellaam Unnode Solluven.
23 seeththim Maraththaal Oru Mejaiyaiyum Pannuvaayaaga; Adhu Irandu Muzha Neelamum Oru Muzha Agalamum Ondrarai Muzha Uyaramumaai Irukkakkadavadhu.
24 adhaip Pasum Pondhakattaal Moodi, Sutrilum Adharkup Ponninaal Thiranaiyai Undaakki,
25 sutrilum Adharku Naalu Virarkataiyaana Sattaththaiyum, Adhin Sattaththirkuch Sutrilum Ponninaal Thiranaiyaiyum Undaakki,
26 adharku Naalu Ponvalaiyangalaip Panni, Avaigalai Adhin Naalu Kaalgalukku Irukkum Naalu Moolaigalilum Thaikkakkadavaai.
27 andha Valaiyangal Mejaiyaich Sumakkum Thandugalukku Idangalaayirukkumbadi, Sattaththin Aruge Irukkavendum.
28 andhath Thandugalaich Seeththim Maraththinaal Seydhu, Avaigalaip Pondhakattaal Moodakkadavaai; Avaigalaal Mejai Sumakkappadavendum.
29 adharkuriya Thattugalaiyum, Dhoobakkarandigalaiyum, Kinnangalaiyum, Paanabali Karakangalaiyum Pannakkadavaai; Avaigalaip Pasumponninaal Pannakkadavaai.
30 mejaiyinmel Niththamum En Sannidhiyil Samugaththappangalai Vaikkakkadavaai.
31 pasumponninaal Oru Kuththuvilakkaiyum Undaakkuvaayaaga; Adhu Ponninaal Adippuvelaiyaaich Seyyappadavendum; Adhin Thandum Kilaigalum Mokkugalum Pazhangalum Pookkalum Ponninaal Seyyappadavendum.
32 aaru Kilaigal Adhin Pakkangalil Vidavendum; Kuththuvilakkin Moondru Kilaigal Adhin Oru Pakkaththilum, Kuththuvilakkin Moondru Kilaigal Adhin Marupakkaththilum Vidavendum.
33 ovvoru Kilaiyile Vaadhumaik Kottaikku Oppaana Moondru Mokkugalum, Oru Pazhamum, Oru Poovum Iruppadhaaga; Kuththuvilakkilirundhu Purappadum Aaru Kilaigalilum Appadiye Irukkavendum.
34 vilakkuththandilo, Vaadhumaik Kottaikku Oppaana Naalu Mokkugalum, Pazhangalum, Pookkalum Iruppadhaaga.

35 adhilirundhu Purappadum Irandu Kilaigalinkeezh Oru Pazhamum, Veru Irandu Kilaigalinkeezh Oru Pazhamum, Matra Irandu Kilaigalinkeezh Oru Pazhamum Iruppadhaaga; Vilakkuththandilirundhu Purappadum Aaru Kilaigalukkum Appadiye Irukkavendum.
36 avaigalin Pazhangalum Avaigalin Kilaigalum Ponninaal Undaanavaigalaayiruppadhaaga; Avaiyellaam Thagadaai Adiththa Pasumponnaal Seyyappatta Ore Velaiyaayirukkavendum.
37 adhil Ezhu Akalgalaich Seyvaayaaga; Adharku Neredhiraai Eriyumbadikku Avaigal Etrappadakkadavadhu.
38 adhin Kaththarigalum Saambal Paaththirangalum Pasumponninaal Seyyappaduvadhaaga.
39 adhaiyum Adharkuriya Panimuttugal Yaavaiyum Oru Thaalandhu Pasumponninaal Pannavendum.
40 malaiyile Unakkuk Kaanbikkappatta Maadhiriyinbadiye Avaigalaich Seyya Echcharikkaiyaayiru.
